content: Dropping in to say hello to this newly formed Zulip large-data community. The Texas Digital Library board is enthusiastic about expanding our larger data support service for the Texas Data Repository in the coming year (FY24-25). We have a subcommittee of the TDR SC working on recommendations for allocating some funding towards a service offering, so we are eager to engage with this group and learn about who is working on the various iterations of the larger data functions.
Sounds like you have funds and need to decide how to allocate them. Great!
:wave: Hi Courtney! Weclome!
Hi hi. I am new to this Zulip so forgiveness my tardiness. Ceilyn and I are developing support content at the moment.
Hiho! Lovely to see this topic getting traction! I'm working for FZJ, the folks with crazy scientists generating very large amounts of data that hopefully one day all get published.
